Blog.post: who have i become,,, i have become the odd man out,,,, i dont think anyone notices me anymore...... Everyone just takes life as a joke, im taking my life seriously, im taking small things too seriously...

Today was one of those lazy tired days. Me and nicki went to haley and chalces house started playing kickball, then steven and kristen came, kristen remined me that she was avoiding me, all that everyone could do is fight, what happened to the days when we could just play a game and and have fun, then nathan and john came, i left...... went to the coffee house natan, john, steven,kristen,casey came down....... Kristen wont talk to her good friends but she'll talk to nathan,,,,, what is going on with kristen..... or have i changed......

Went to nickis house after school,, kristen came over, she dident say anything to me, i dident say anything to her,,, i went to the park,played basketball, nicki, kristen, haley and chalce came, started play kickball, kristen dident play, steven got mad and quit, kristen just isent the same person anymore,, yount came about an 20 min later,,, anytime someone from out of the neightboorhood comes she just completely ignors me, its almost like were not friends anymore...................

Me and nick were at haleys house, i told her that is still like kristen, she wasent happy and i just dont understand why....... I seen kristen talking to anna, when i got home i found out from steven that kristne was going to kennywood with anna, whats going on just 2 weeks ago she was saying how mean anna is.. kristen has really changed.............

Was able to talk to nicki for a short time, told her that kristen wont talk to me until i tell her how she has changed. Got to talk to randall. Everything is still unsettled... I got a million things i want to tell kristen,, i still like her, but someone has to tell her how she has changed, im afraid to tell her, the truth hurts.... I have to tell her that i still like her and how our friendship is different now that she knows................

Me nicki start to become better friends, but as me and nicki become better friends me and kristen become worse friends,,, ever since i told kristen i like her it hasent been the same. Yesterday when i found out she dident like me i just want to avoid her, i have nothing to say to her. I told kristen that me and nicki were talking about how she has changed, i wouldent tell her how she has change, she got mad and said she wouldent talk to me untill i told her. I dont want to tell her, i know it will just make things a lot worse. Maby its best that i dont see kristen for awhile............

Went to youth day talk,, wanted to talk to kristen all day,, of course i dident. Got home got to talk to nicki at haleys house, it was good to finally talk to nicki, we went to kristens asked her i she liked me, she fixed things with her boyfriend,,,, i just dont know who i like anymore, my life just keeps getting more and more confusing,,, id love to move and start new......................

Finally on ok day. Talked to kristen on instant messenger, i kept saying how good she looked and how nice she is, i just kept going on and on. Went to the coffee house got to see christina mcune beat up john, it was funny,,, so that ends me ok day.

Today was one of those day that you could go to sleep right after school, kinda an easy day at school. 4pd basic video got to jump out of locker, it was fun. I spent part of my day just walking around. Went to the park, nicki,kristen,steven,dan s, came down. I was able to talk to kristen, finally, me and nicki stared talking about kristen, i told nicki that i like kristen, as we were walking up from the park, i told kristen that i like her,, its about time i brought that up again, i found out kristen is going to break up with her boyfriend on thursday.......................

Today was a boring yet exciting change from the ordinary day. I dident mind being in school today. School life improving, thats a good thing. Im starting to get my life back together.... Everything seemed normal untill the afternoon bus ride, poring rain and thunder, windows down on bus, water pouring into bus, everyone was wild on the bus today, it was a definte change from the ordinary. As for nicki and kristen, well i really dont want to talk to them, they have changeed too much. The rest of my day was spent hanging out at the park not really doing much...........

Today day started out like any other monday, tired, boring, just waiting for somthing to happen, long day at school, just a boring day. Went to the park nicki,steven,nathan,brian and chris was there. Nicki and kristen have really changed over the past year, there different people, there not the same people i know. They take like as a joke and right now and my life isent a joke, they joke with there feelings and im done joking around, "life is real". Right now i'd give anything to just move far away, a new life, new friends, new everything............

What a day, my day started just like any other BORING day, until tonight, at the park with ,Steven,zac and Chris,,, an of course Nathan was TRYING to act like a good skate border, it was funny watching him fall, than kristen and anna came down,,, anna not one a favorite people,, me zac, steven and nathan started playing basketball, of course me and zac lost, not a surprise to me, than nathan started saying stuff about anna anna got mad and got iced tea on nathan and started throwing rocks at nathan, nathan ran away like a baby,,,,, i really want to tell kristen that i like her and why, but no time really seems like the right time to tell her,,,,,,,,,, and that ended another one of my days.................

last night around 8:00 i was at haley and chalces house with steven,nicki,kristen,randall, they dident even notice me, i was little mad, but its just the age difference, "it's easier to live backwords than foreword" because you already lived backwords.

The past few days have been hell for me,,, on tuesday i told kristen i liked her, dident say why, is was sick majorly that day, told her we’d talk the next day, dident get a chance to, stayed home from school, to afraid to talkt to her, avoided her all day, the rest of the week is seen her hanging around chris,nathan,steven,brian, it makes me mad and jealous, its driving me crazy not to tell her, im just afraid to bring up the subject again, right now shes on instant messenger just to afraid to talk to her, dont want to tell her why i like her on instant messenger, i think i should tell nicki she could relay it to kristen but i’d rather tell her in person, what should i do, im so upset im about to cry i need tell but i mean she already has a boyfriend and even though i need to tell her i dont want it to change our friendship i just starting to rebecome friends with her,,,,, all the the years i’v know kristen we really werent good friend in fact last year i kinda disliked her,,, now that were starting to become friends i dont want anything to change,,, my life is already screwed up, this just makes it a 100% worse, its driving me crazy!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Today i went to the old club areas, knowing that going there will make me feel alot worse and it did, the place has really changed, i felt so unconfortable there i was angery and sad, i couldent stop thinking about who i was,, who i was when these log walls were standing high, every time i go there i always find somthing of mine and every time i pick that object up i can remember what was going through my head when it was built................

Another day spent trying to find out what im good at. First i found drawing but i can only draw what i was used to seeing, i cant finish a drawing, then theres basketball, i can be good at that just not now i got too many things on my mind and then theres somthing i always used to do, draw ideas for futuristic inventions, i can still do that its just not the same.................
Every day i look back and see the person i was and try to be that person, life was so easy then, now im not sure if my life was really that great then..................
Feelings toward everyone have changed,,,,, i have strong feelings toward someone and i dont think she feels the same way..........................

Normal, somthing we all take for granted untill its gone, its like when your sick your off from school for a few days, at first you dont miss normal, then you start to miss waking up, doing your morning rutine, going to school and maby thers friends you like to talk to and then you go thru out your day, but when normals gone nothing seems to make sense........................

We all need to be good at somthing, and we all need to know were good a somthing, but what happens when the thing your good at is gone, when you cant be good at it anymore, you feel like a part of you is missing, and after you realize you cant be good at it anymore you go a search to find somthing else you good at, but most of the time its not that easy, you feel like you have to great at every new thing you try or you give up....................

kristen i still like you and nothing will change that........................... Yet another day spent at the park thinking,, i dont think anyone care about me,, my day is spent full of sadness, another sun set watched at the park and yet another horrible day goes by,,, so many things going thru my head its driving me crazy, so many thoughts, so many questions with no answers, why me?, why am i going thru this? why did my life have to change?,,,,,, i cant remember what happyness feels like.........

Know one knows who i am and i dont think anyone around here will.... The place that is home dosent feel like home anymore,, i feel traped in this place, today i walked around and this place donsent feel like home it feels more like a prision....... i cant stand living here anymore,, the people here sometimes make it worse they dont know who i am, im full of secrets... i think there is only one person here who can understand me but im still to afraid to open up and reveal the true me, i know that if i open up i will be alot happier and feel alot better but i just dont know if im ready..........

what ever happend to a day when there is peace.... when there is no conflict between people there still the fight with my self,, all the secrets i have that im dying to tell someone, and to show the real me.......

Life is like a road the path you life should go is staight, but the path is full of bends and intersections.. My life took took the wrong turn............................ Know one knows the real me and im afraid to show the real me
Im feeling alot better, now that im talking to kristen again,,, i still need to know how she feels about me...........................
I cant put how i feel right now into words,,,, im sad, angery and so much more..................................
Everytime i see her i realize how much i like her, and i asume she hates me, shes never really said wether she likes me or not.......

Everything is getting a bit better, im not sad as i was but somtimes im as sad as i was and i know why........ kristen wouldent know everything is getter better because we dont talk.........................
I like her so much, im afraid to talk to her, for the first time im too shy to talk to kristen...............................

I always hid things in my life, i always ran away from good things in my life, im finally realizing that running away isent a life,,,, I also have a habbit of asuming things i dont know, i guess thats why i havent talked to you, because you know how i feel about you, but i dont know how you feel about me.........................
2 questions still remain unanswered,,, kristen please answer them,,, are we friends, do you really like me..........................

When i felt sad or angery i would go to a spot on the edge of the woods and just sit there staring into the woods and some how i would feel better, or when i was feeling really bad i would go the club sit back with my feet on the table and look all around, now there is no place to go...........

Today was another sad day untill i seen kristen, so much to tell her, the 2 questions still remain unanswered and kristen needs to answer them,,,, well i guess when i seen kristen somthing in my mind just slipped, and there i was riding my bike down the hill as fast as i could, not paying attention to anything but going fast, i was standing on my bike not caring if i got hit by a car and hoping i would, i kept doing this untill i got so tired i couldent and common sense kicked in,, im so afraid ill do it again, im afraid of what ill do...............................
Shes means so much to me and i need answers for two unanswered questions, are we friends, becaused lately it hasent seemed like it,,, Do you really like me?..................
I really like her, she means so much to me and she cant see that....... She dosent think shes pretty, thats not true why would she think that. Shes a great person......

The reason why i hide the real me is because of what people would say, today i found out that people do say things, things that make me feel so much worse, i also found out that friends will understand and everyone else will say things,, the only thing that kept me together today was a quote from the book Atlas Shrugged- "Do not let your fire go out, spark by irreplaceable spark, in the hopeless swamps of the not-quite, the not-yet, the not-at-all. Do not let the hero in your soul perish, in lonely frustration for the life you deserved, but have never been able to reach. The world you desired can be won, it exists, it is real, it is possible, it's yours."

in my last post i said i was going to stop my blog but i cant this is the only way i can get everything out. most of time it easier to write it down then to tell someone. Over the past week i guess i put my life on hold while she was gone, i like her alot and she dosent feel the same way,, i have been quetioning alot of things,, are we friends, i dont know thinking back to winter were we spent months not talking and friends dont do that, friends cant do that.... Every day i feel like i dont belong in rural ridge, and nearly every day somthing happens that keeps me knowing that i dont belong here.......... Every day is find out what i can and can not do, every day i push my self to the limit know the risks and not careing and i do it because i think i can relieve the sadness im feeling, i cant play basketball and know i can play a few weeks ago i could and i know why i cant play its because im play for all the wrong reasons i was playing it because it was fun now i play it to get my mind on somthing else, to not be sad..... Every day i leave with out telling anyone, i leave because i started thinking and im not thinking any happy thoughts................ the music i listen to isnet helping i listen to that describes how i feel and who i am................

i have decided to stop my blog or at least for awhile, when life is at its worst its easy for me just to write down how i feel but right now i think i have to work it out in person...................................
Kristen can read me like a book, i have been unhappy. Its because i have this feeling that kristen dosent really want to be with me,, i want to be with her, i love her.................
